name: Flamebearer (LaptopCoder11)
description:
The Ceremonial Flame must be carried through the castle.
Keep it away from the extremely flammable wooden walls.

Made in 72 hours for BenBonk Game Jam #4 
with the theme of Keep it Away and the limitation of only 4 colors.

The color palette used:
#FF7500 (Fire)
#7F4C07 (Wood)
#898989 (Stone)
#000000 (Player)
Some parts of the game use a slightly darker variant
of these (via layered image alpha) to give details.
I have not counted menu text or lighting effects as part of the colors.
